## Examples

# 1. Loading (unofficial) package  
(Official package will be released later.)  
```{r}
source("R/F0101-BvZINB5.R")
```


# 2. Random data generation.
```{r}
set.seed(1)
dat <- rBvZINB5 (100, param=c(1, 1, 2, 1, 1, 0.5, 0.1, 0.1, 0.3))
x <- dat[, 1]
y <- dat[, 2]
```


# 3. Estimating BZINB parameters and true correlation (rho*)  
(This will be updated with C++ with much faster speed.)  

```{r}
# Maximum likelihood estimation
result <- ML.BvZINB5(x, y, maxiter = 100)

# true correlation and its standard error.
result[c("rho", "se.rho")] 
```
